{"id":934905760,"lang":"javascript","lang_name":"JavaScript","time":"4 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1681675976,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"63 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/934905760/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Happy Number","memory":"43.5 MB","code":"/**\n * @param {number} n\n * @return {boolean}\n */\nvar isHappy = function(n) {\n    let [slow, fast] = [sumOfSquares(n), sumOfSquares(sumOfSquares(n))]\n    while (true) {\n        if (fast === 1) return true\n        if (slow === fast) return false\n        slow = sumOfSquares(slow)\n        fast = sumOfSquares(sumOfSquares(fast))\n    }\n}\n\nfunction sumOfSquares(n) {\n    return (n % 10) ** 2 + (n === 0 ? 0 : sumOfSquares(Math.floor(n / 10)))\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"happy-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
